name: Sudokolorful
description:
Sudokolorful is a color-based puzzle game, suitable for color blindness, which reinvents the classic Sudoku game.
Your main objective is to fill every empty spot with a color, being careful to not repeat colors in the same line, column and neighborhood (bigger squares).



  • Challenge your brain with different types of Sudoku: 4x4, 6x6 and 9x9
  • Choose between three difficulties: easy, medium and hard
  • Color blindness? Turn Colorblind Mode On. Color palette carefully thought for every type of color blindness but Achromatopsia
  • Save your current game anytime
  • Do you prefer the classic Sudoku? Turn the numbers on
  • Do you like to chill a little bit? Turn the timer off and enjoy your experience with a relaxing soundtrack
  • Do you like competition? Rank every game to your local Ranking
